title: Chat Interface
body: Interesting game concept but you need to remove the chat box. Everything in there is hateful and toxic and completely ruins an otherwise amazing game.

replies.body:
Low ELO problems. You are just lv31 and playing with the worst of the worst.

By the time you progress a bit, all the screaming rejects will have been rejected with great velocity, and chat will be a much nicer place. Removing it would be a huge problem for better teams, and toxic trash would just find other less easily punished ways to display their lack of self-control.
We are in tft board. Please stay on topic.
Nobody even chats in tft, OP is just lost.
If you do not like when someone is talking, there is a mute option. Chat isn't going anywhere as communication is a key part of any game.
You can remove ally's chat from the settings > communication.
